config.gamma_shifter.silent_mode.tooltip: Silent Mode hides all HUD elements of the mod
config.gamma_shifter.gamma.tooltip: The custom gamma value. This value is not used by Auto Night Mode.
config.gamma_shifter.change_per_input.to: The percent change in gamma when the increase/decrease key is pressed
config.gamma_shifter.always_start_enable: Whether the mod always starts enabled or not
config.gamma_shifter.snap.tooltip: Snaps the gamma to the nearest multiple of the change per input value
config.gamma_shifter.always_save_custom_: Save the customized gamma to options.txt regardless of whether the mod is toggled on/off
config.gamma_shifter.preset_one.tooltip: The gamma value to set when the Preset 1 key is pressed
config.gamma_shifter.preset_two.tooltip: The gamma value to set when the Preset 2 key is pressed
config.gamma_shifter.show_current_gamma_: If enabled, the current gamma is displayed in the top left corner at all times
config.gamma_shifter.persistent_overlay_: The location that the persistent gamma display is shown
config.gamma_shifter.textColour.tooltip: The colour used for text in HUD elements
config.gamma_shifter.show_message_on_gam: Enables/disables a message above the hotbar when the increase/decrease gamma key is pressed
config.gamma_shifter.enforce_bounds.tool: Whether gamma values should be bounded to 0%-1000% (behaviour of very high/low values is untested)
config.gamma_shifter.auto_night.tooltip: Automatically increases and decreases gamma at dusk and dawn
config.gamma_shifter.auto_night_value.to: The gamma will be set when Night Mode turns on
